**Shalya-parvan 15.1 a-b** *स्वर्गं ह्येव समास्थाय रणयज्ञेषु दीक्षिताः | यजन्ते क्षत्रिया लोकांस्तद्विद्धि मगधाधिप ||१५||*
Who is the king of Magadha mentioned in this verse?
A) Yudhiṣṭhira B) Bhīma C) Jarāsandha D) Kṛṣṇa

entry.answer: C) Jarāsandha • The verse begins with "Jarāsandha uvaaca" (Jarāsandha said), making him the speaker. • Kṛṣṇa and Arjuna are not mentioned as speakers here. • Bhīma's role is as a warrior, not a speaker in this context.
